title: HudsTrend Hawke 6/24: Roe v. Wade, Monkeypox, Stacy Abrams, Elvis
itunes:title: HudsTrend Hawke 6/24: Roe v. Wade, Monkeypox, Stacy Abrams, Elvis
description:
In this edition of HudsTrend Hawke, Jack and Miles discuss the Supreme Court overturning Roe v. Wade, it's sweeping implications and the media's reaction to it, the Monkeypox epidemic, Stacy Abrams thinking ACAB means "All Cops Are Broke", and the new Elvis movie!
